description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. A girl lost in the ocean infested by sharks. will you be able to make her survive,  swimming without drawing attention of sharks? You will face a new breed of sharks more deadly than the great white shark,  which leaves behind a trail of death and blood.
